page.description: Get a list of the API keys that have been issued.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

description.p: The scopes granted to the key. See [/GetAPIScopeCodes] for more details.
The date the key was created.
If "T", key has been revoked. If *[js:null]*, key has not been revoked.
The date the key was revoked. *[js:null]* if key has not been revoked.

section.title: Node
Xbasic
section.example: dim apikey as c = "Your_api_key" dim postdata as c dim url as c = "" dim pr as p pr = a5dialogHelper_transformAPIQuery(url,postdata,apikey) if pr.error = .f. then dim result as c result = pr.result else dim errorText as c errorText = pr.errorText end if
